definition: high post and generous salary (idiom); promotion to a high official position

sentences.english: By the time the dignitaries had filed out, it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 当这些高官显贵鱼贯而出之后，一切都太晚了。

sentences.english: Let this poor monk be the first to congratulate this future official.
sentences.chinese: 让贫僧做第一个向将来高官道喜的人吧。

sentences.english: Inside Otoh Gunga is the High Board Room of the Gungan Rep Council.
sentences.chinese: 冈根代表会议高官办公室位于奥托冈加城内。

sentences.english: Zhou is China's top security official.
sentences.chinese: 周是中国安全部的高官。

sentences.english: Several senior officials from the Chinese Football Association have been arrested over match-fixing allegations.
sentences.chinese: 几名中国足协的高官由于操纵假球受到指控并被逮捕。

sentences.english: Chang is said to be unpopular and at odds with some top generals.
sentences.chinese: 据说，张成泽不得人心，而且与多名高官不和。

sentences.english: "Such a conclusion would be ill-advised," a senior U.S. official said.
sentences.chinese: “这一结论是没头脑的想法，”美国一位高官表示。

sentences.english: That was Yukio Edano, a senior Japanese government official, speaking through a translator.
sentences.chinese: 以上为日本政府高官枝野幸男讲话的翻译。

sentences.english: He said he brought up family planning in meetings with high governmentofficials here.
sentences.chinese: 他说，在和政府高官开会时，他提出了计划生育建议。

sentences.english: Jang is also a top military official, according to the professor.
sentences.chinese: 这位教授说，张成泽同时也是一位军队高官。

sentences.english: Senior official Xu Qiliang of the Chinese Air Force said recently that the militarization in outer space is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 中国空军高官许其亮近期称，外空军事化不可避免。

sentences.english: Srivastava thought its top officials might want to know about his discovery.
sentences.chinese: 斯利瓦斯塔瓦以为它的高官肯会想知道他的发现。

sentences.english: We can see from the cyan and purple on the ribbon that he is of high rank.
sentences.chinese: 看那绶带上的青紫色，就知道他是高官显爵。

sentences.english: Officials should be shamed into stopping their friends from stealing or wasting water.
sentences.chinese: 政府高官要严肃查处偷水浪费水的现象。

sentences.english: His manner reeks high position with high pay.
sentences.chinese: 他的气派表现得好像是个高官厚禄的人物。

sentences.english: But don’t expect such qualms to stop the juggernaut.
sentences.chinese: 但是不要期望这样的疑虑会阻止这些高官们。

definition: the emperor relatives (idiom); person with powerful connections
aids and advisors of top officials
